sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <UpdateUser xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">${wsUsername}</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">${wsPassword}</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">${company}</company> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">${oldTargetName}</targetName> <!-- nillable--> <person xsi:type="m:SoapPersonParameters"> <!-- nillable--> <active xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${active}</active> <!-- nillable--> <customAttributes xsi:type="m:SoapRoleList"><!-- Array[] nillable--> ${customAttributes} </customAttributes> <!-- nillable--> <customFields xsi:type="m:SoapRoleList"><!-- Array[] nillable--> ${customFields} </customFields> <externallyOwned xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${externallyOwned}</externallyOwned> <!-- nillable--> <firstName xsi:type="xsd:string">${firstName}</firstName> <hasMobileAccess xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${mobileAccess}</hasMobileAccess> <!-- nillable--> <language xsi:type="xsd:string">${language}</language> <!-- nillable--> <lastName xsi:type="xsd:string">${lastName}</lastName> <!-- nillable--> <roles xsi:type="m:SoapRoleList"><!-- Array[] nillable--> ${role} </roles> <!-- nillable--> <site xsi:type="xsd:string">${site}</site> <!-- nillable--> <supervisors xsi:type="m:SoapSupervisorList"> ${supervisors} </supervisors> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">${targetName}</targetName> <!-- nillable--> <timeZone xsi:type="xsd:string">${timeZone}</timeZone> <!-- nillable--> <webLogin xsi:type="m:SoapWebLogin"> <!-- nillable--> <ldapDomain xsi:type="xsd:string">${ldapDomain}</ldapDomain> <!-- nillable--> <login xsi:type="xsd:string">${webLogin}</login> <type xsi:type="xsd:string">${webLoginType}</type> </webLogin> </person> </UpdateUser> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
